data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Dhaka.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dhaka, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: the county of Dhaka has (about) 15,088 people who know Jesus, 36,132 people who know about him culturally, and 11,992,780 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Dhaka, Dhaka, Bangladesh know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 15,088 believers in the county of Dhaka to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Kaghazi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, sanctify the 15,088 believers in Dhaka and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Dhaka, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Dhaka, Dhaka, Bangladesh to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

location.name: Dhaka
location.people_groups_list: Kahar (Muslim traditions), Kandu, Jogi (Muslim traditions), Jaraj (Muslim traditions), Jamadar
